segments.text: What does your company do exactly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We design and assemble a wide range of electric generators for hospitals , hotels anc small factories . We specialise in medium-sized generators but we're hoping to diversify into larger models next year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And who do you sell to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We export to Eastern Europe and the Far East . The domestic market accounts for about 40 percent of our total sales .
segments.speaker: S2
